numbered_ace_sentences: 1. This is Wednesday's live moderation of "What’s Going On in This Graph?".
2. Today's graph is about college admissions.
3. The graph is about the twelve most selective colleges in the United States.
4. A relative attended a college.
5. A student applies to the college.
6. The graph asks how having such a relative relates to the chance that the student is admitted.
7. The student's parents have an income.
8. The graph asks how the parents' income relates to the chance that the student is admitted.
9. Today, from 9 am to 2 pm E.T., you can share your responses online.
10. There are four questions.
11. A notice may include a claim.
12. If a notice includes a claim then the notice must include evidence that supports the claim.
13. By Friday morning, we will reveal a free link to the online article.
14. The online article included these graphs.
15. By Friday morning, we will also give shout outs for some of the catchiest headlines.
16. A user can get a link to the user's response.
17. The user can share the link with the user's teacher.
18. The user can share the link with the user's classmates.
19. The user can click the response box below the user's response.
20. The response box contains the text "Email me when my comment is published".
21. The next graph will be released by Friday, February 2.
22. There will be live moderation on Wednesday, February 7.
23. The topic of the next graph is 2023 global temperatures.
